output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes, CMF 11240017 is present at the end of the post, indicating this is electoral content.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, directly mentions "Marcel Ciolacu" who is a presidential candidate (ION-MARCEL CIOLACU - PSD).
3. Addresses wide population: Yes, this is a paid advertisement on Facebook and Instagram, targeting a large audience (100,001-500,000 people).
4. Electoral objective: Yes, the post promotes Marcel Ciolacu's achievements as Prime Minister, highlighting a significant accomplishment (Schengen entry) which could influence voters' perception.
5. Journalism: No, this is not journalistic content but rather promotional material highlighting PSD and Ciolacu's achievements.
6. Personal opinion: No, this is an official party communication (PSD Dolj) with a CMF number.
The post specifically promotes Marcel Ciolacu's achievements during a period when presidential election propaganda is not allowed (after November 23, 2024, 18:00).

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This constitutes electoral propaganda because: - It has an official CMF number - It directly promotes a presidential candidate's achievements - It's a paid advertisement reaching a large audience - It's posted by an official party organization (PSD Dolj) - It uses campaign-specific hashtags - It aims to influence public opinion about the candidate
conclusion.message-for-police: PSD Dolj, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin difuzarea unui material de propagandă electorală (ID postare Facebook: 1068912664984786) după încheierea perioadei de campanie electorală. Materialul promovează în mod direct candidatul prezidențial Ion Marcel Ciolacu, evidențiind realizările acestuia ca prim-ministru în contextul aderării României la spațiul Schengen. Postarea include număr CMF (11240017), este sponsorizată pentru a ajunge la un public larg (100,001-500,000 persoane) și are un evident caracter electoral, fiind difuzată după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, încălcând astfel prevederile legale privind încetarea campaniei electorale.
